mapper.insert: insert into company(com_num ,com_name, com_tel, com_addr, com_scale, com_business, com_contract) values (com_seq.NEXTVAL,#{com_name}, #{com_tel}, #{com_addr}, #{com_scale}, #{com_business},#{com_contract})
mapper.select: SELECT writer, title, contents, refdate,no FROM company where no=#{no}
